TopicTitle: Long time lurker, first time poster.

Articles.Content:
I'm an aspiring physics major. This is my first year of college, and I give credit to this game for inspiring me to reach for goals that are in the stars. I started playing in 0.24 about a year ago, and I took a long break.

I just recently I got back into this game with 1.0.4, and I have finally acquired enough knowledge to fly efficiently, and to make confident maneuvers without autopilot! Needless to say, I'm about ready to start joining in on more technical discussions. I look forward to being a part of this community!

HAWLY MOLY DAT PHYSICS MAJOR DOE!!!

Nice! Welcome to the forums, have some rep
Going into a physics major is an awesome way to go. Good luck! And congrats for being able to fly effectively!
